posts.post_content:
Offered here are 5 B18 Blankets including Peckinpaugh. All are in nice shape with excellent color, clarity and 4 full brown borders 
Boone is an odd printer error with the bases stamp lines visible and the registration of the basepaths and back off. The image is crisp and clear
19.99
McAllister Purple Pennants is very nice with a small product stain on the back
39.99
O Miller Green infield is very nice with some light creases 
19.99
Peckinpaugh has great look with a few light creases 
29.99
Whaling is nice too with light toning here and there
19.99
Net prices . Sold
